text: EN 50155:2017 is an international standard covering electronic equipment used on rolling stock for railway applications. The standard covers aspects of this electronic equipment, including temperature, humidity, shock, vibration, and other parameters. A copy of the standard may be purchased from authorised standards agencies, e.g. BSI in the UK.https://shop.bsigroup.com/ProductDetail/?pid=000000000030282634 ==References== ==External links== #50155
title: EN 50155
